content.prompt: The scenes represented on the tympanum affected pilgrims entering the church by eliciting responses of

choices.label: sadness at the depiction of Christ as a sacrificial lamb
joy at the sight of the Virgin Mary as Queen of Heaven
dread at the scenes of punishment and torment
enlightenment at the portrayal of events from historical texts
